There is a "Feature State" column available on the Feature Management workspace which shows "Preview" if the feature is not general availability. This means that the correct answer is A - Yes.

There is a feature management in LCS which states this "This Preview feature management setting lets users enable or disable public or private previews." and has a button for enable/disable.

There is also a feature management in D365FO which has option to enable preview features. However, if you go to the terms of these preview, you would notice that it made several references to the fact that the feature is "licensed to you". This means that it is not a public preview because public preview, and the question says that the public preview does not require additional license.

So the answer is B.

questions.question_text:
You are employed as a Dynamics 365 Finance system administrator at your company.
You have been tasked with making sure that users are able to quickly reduce the number of records. To do this, the data must be filtered according to specified criteria.
Which of the following is the appropriate query filter syntax for today's date in a date field?
Which filter syntax should you use? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

choices.C: As a minimum, you need Microsoft Office 2010 and Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation.
choices.B: As a minimum, you need Microsoft Office 2019 and a Microsoft Azure DevOps project.
choices.D: As a minimum, you need Microsoft Office 2019 and Dynamics 365 Project Service Automation.
choices.A: As a minimum, you need Microsoft Office 2010 and a Microsoft Azure DevOps project.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
correct!

A. As a minimum, you need Microsoft Office 2010 and a Microsoft Azure DevOps project.

The correct option for using Business Process Modeler (BPM) in a Dynamics 365 Finance environment is A. As a minimum, you need Microsoft Office 2010 and a Microsoft Azure DevOps project.

Business Process Modeler (BPM) is a tool available within Lifecycle Services (LCS) that allows you to document, analyze, and design business processes for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance. To utilize BPM, you would need a supported version of Microsoft Office, such as Office 2010 or later. This is because BPM integrates with Microsoft Office applications, such as Excel and Visio, to create and modify process flowcharts.

Additionally, to effectively manage and collaborate on the business processes within BPM, it is recommended to have a Microsoft Azure DevOps project set up. Azure DevOps provides a platform for version control, task management, and collaboration, enabling teams to work together on BPM-related activities and track changes.
Selected Answer: A
Selected Answer: A

Selected Answer: A
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/lifecycle-services/bpm-overview

Selected Answer: A
A correct

You want to make sure that you are able to use Business Process Modeler (BPM) in the environment.
Which of the following is TRUE with regards to using BPM?

The Global search reporting tool can be used to speedily find personal data for a specified individual.
Select `No adjustment required` if the underlined segment is accurate. If the underlined segment is inaccurate, select the accurate option.

discussion.content: I don't see where the question is actually asked.
ummm WHAT underlined segment?

Selected Answer: B
The Person search report is a feature of Dynamics 365 that can be used to speedily find personal data for a specified individual.

Selected Answer: B
B Personal search report is used for GDPR.

Selected Answer: B
B. Person search report

The underlined segment is inaccurate. The Global search reporting tool is not specifically designed for finding personal data for a specified individual. To accurately reflect the functionality described, the underlined segment should be replaced with "Person search report."

The Person search report in Dynamics 365 allows users to search for and retrieve information about a specified individual across various data sources within the system. This report can help locate relevant records and data associated with a specific person.

Therefore, the accurate option is B. Person search report.

questions.question_text:
Your company make use of Dynamics 365 Finance.
You are responsible for assessing business processes and their related prerequisites, which includes bugs, tasks, backlog items, tests, and documents.
You have been tasked with tracking the progress of your implementation project and correlate different work items with prerequisites and business processes. You also have to detect and distribute bug fixes within your regular delivery schedule.
Which of the following should you use to create business process maps?

discussion.content: Incorrect, the business process modeler has nothing to do with work items or bugfixes. Correct answer is C

comments.content: NO, read the question carefully - "Which of the following should you use to create business process maps?" so B is correct (The information at the beginning of the question are not relevant)
Which of the following should you use to create business process maps for that question I think the answer should be B

discussion.content: You start the implementation stage of a project by synchronizing a Business process modeler (BPM) library with your project in Microsoft Azure DevOps. In this way, you can review processes and associate requirements with business processes. By synchronizing a BPM library with a Azure DevOps project, you can also track the progress of your implementation project in Azure DevOps, and can associate various work items with requirements and business processes. These work items include bugs, tasks, backlog items, tests, and documents.

Selected Answer: B
Business process modeler (BPM) is a tool that you can use to create, view, and modify repeatable implementations that are based on business process libraries.
